verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Glory to Christ on high! Let heav'n and earth reply! Praise ye His name! His love and grade adore, Who all our sorrows bore; Sing loud for evermore, “Worthy the Lamb!”{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}While they around the throne Cheerfully join in one, Praising his name: We, who have felt his blood, Sealing our peace with God, Sound his dear name abroad, Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Join, all ye ransomed race, Our Lord and God to bless; Praise ye his name: In him we will rejoice, And make a joyful noise, Shouting with heart and voice, Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What though we change our place, Yet we shall never cease Praising his name: To him our songs we bring— Hail him our gracious King, And, without ceasing, sing Worthy the Lamb.{/lang-eng}
